metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Blue Skies and a Battle is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Blue Skies and a Battle has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Minor, F Minor, G♯ Minor,  and E♭ Lydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
